property.name: application.locale
property.description: Application Locale. If it's changed, log messages are also changed. Currently Korean and English are supported.

property.name: hive.query.simultaneously.per.user
property.description: Allowed number of simultaneous Hive query executions per user.

property.name: hive.query.execute.user
property.description: Name of user who sends Hive query to Hive Server. If this user name is different, Hive query won't be executed.

property.name: monitoring.system.path
property.description: Path to save the system monitoring information

property.name: monitoring.engine.path
property.description: Path to save the engine monitoring information

property.name: monitoring.hadoop.path
property.description: Path to save Hadoop monitoring information

property.name: action.log.max.size
property.description: Max log size when loading actions

property.name: working.path
property.description: Path to save logs for actions

property.name: system.temporary.path
property.description: Temporary path where Flamingo Workflow Engine uses

property.name: artifact.caching
property.description: Options for caching whether to save artifacs such as MapReduce jar files. If it's on, caching is enabled so it might slow down.

property.name: artifact.cache.path
property.description: Path where artifacs such as MapReduce JAR files are saved.

property.name: hadoop.user.name
property.description: System user account for Hadoop Security
